title: Exari Appoints Allison Cusano as VP of Financial Services Solutions
text:
Deep domain expertise coupled with an outstanding sales record will accelerate Exari’s growth in the Financial Services Industry
Boston, MA
Exari, the leader in cloud-based contract lifecycle management software, today announced that Allison Cusano has been appointed Vice President of financial services solutions, reporting to Terry Lee, President, Exari Americas. Cusano will be responsible for driving business growth in the financial services sector, including banking, capital markets, asset management, hedge funds and specialty insurers.
“Allison brings a strong track record of delivering results and has worked with some of the biggest names in the financial services industry”, said Terry Lee. “Her combination of deep insight into financial services pain points and broad relationships come at a time when Exari is dramatically extending its lead in financial services. I’m thrilled to have Allison on the team.”
Cusano was most recently with SAP, where she held various sales roles, most recently responsible for analytics sales within the Financial Services Industry. Allison brings over 20 years of enterprise software sales experience. She excelled in a variety of field leadership positions at Oracle, Portal Software and PeopleSoft prior to SAP.
“Exari’s sophisticated contract management solutions have already delivered massive value to financial services firms in the areas of compliance, risk management and business efficiency”, said Cusano. “I’m excited to join the company to drive even more success in this large and growing market.”
For more information on how Exari Contract Lifecycle Management software is making business users and legal professionals more productive, visit http://www.exari.com .
About Exari
Exari ( http://www.exari.com ) is a global leader in cloud-based Contract Lifecycle Management solutions. Used worldwide by legal, sales, insurance, investment banking, and government professionals, Exari solutions improve visibility into contract data and reduces costs, cycle time and risk. Exari solutions are used by thousands of users to manage millions of contracts worldwide.
